title: How to Stock a Spice Cabinet

steps.headline: Always keep a selection of basic savory spices on hand:
steps.description: Salt Black pepper Bay leaves Thyme Oregano Cumin Coriander Cayenne pepper Steak seasoning

steps.headline: Stock Asian seasonings if you do any Eastern cooking:
steps.description: Coriander Star Anise Cumin Nutmeg Mace Black pepper Cardamom Fennel Ginger Turmeric Mustard seeds

steps.headline: Keep on hand these basic spices if you like to cook standard European food:
steps.description: Allspice Dill Paprika Caraway Marjoram Rosemary Oregano Sage Thyme Dried garlic

steps.headline: Cook delicious, authentic Indian food with these spices:
steps.description: Cardamom Coriander Cumin Curry powder Whole mustard seed Clove Cinnamon Fenugreek Saffron Turmeric Ginger

steps.headline: Make terrific Spanish and Mexican dishes with these basic regional spices:
steps.description: Chili pepper Paprika Saffron Chili (such as chipotle) Mexican oregano

steps.headline: Find room on your spice shelf for these seasonings if you want to experiment with some Mediterranean recipes:
steps.description: Basil Dill Fennel seed Marjoram Oregano Parsley Rosemary Thyme Cinnamon

steps.headline: Don't forget about stocking some basic baking spices:
steps.description: Clove Nutmeg Cinnamon Ginger Cream of tartar

text: Always keep a selection of basic savory spices on hand: Salt Black pepper Bay leaves Thyme Oregano Cumin Coriander Cayenne pepper Steak seasoning Stock Asian seasonings if you do any Eastern cooking: Coriander Star Anise Cumin Nutmeg Mace Black pepper Cardamom Fennel Ginger Turmeric Mustard seeds Keep on hand these basic spices if you like to cook standard European food: Allspice Dill Paprika Caraway Marjoram Rosemary Oregano Sage Thyme Dried garlic Cook delicious, authentic Indian food with these spices: Cardamom Coriander Cumin Curry powder Whole mustard seed Clove Cinnamon Fenugreek Saffron Turmeric Ginger Make terrific Spanish and Mexican dishes with these basic regional spices: Chili pepper Paprika Saffron Chili (such as chipotle) Mexican oregano Find room on your spice shelf for these seasonings if you want to experiment with some Mediterranean recipes: Basil Dill Fennel seed Marjoram Oregano Parsley Rosemary Thyme Cinnamon Don't forget about stocking some basic baking spices: Clove Nutmeg Cinnamon Ginger Cream of tartar
